Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a player A player has a name, a number of healthpoints, a diary and an inventory He can be armed and the inventory can have 4 items max
    Version:
    (14/11/2017)
    Author:
    (WoZGrp4)
